Instruction: 查询基金,依次获取20200111到20230111期:
###Function Call: step1={

 "function1": "query_fund_name_or_code",
 "output1": "result1",
 "description1": "华商优势行业的基金代码",
 "arg2": ["易方达蓝筹精选", ""],
 "function2": "query_fund_name_or_code",
 "output2": "result2",
 "description2": "易方达蓝筹精选的基金代码"
},step2={

 "function1": "query_fund_data",
 "output1": "result3",
 "description1": "华商优势行业相关的时序数据",
 "arg2": ["result2", "20200111", "20230111"],
 "function2": "query_fund_data",
 "output2": "result4",
 "description2": "易方达蓝筹精选相关的时序数据"
},step3={
 "arg1": ["result3", "Cumulative_Earnings_Rate"],
 "function1": "calculate_stock_index",
 "output1": "result5",
 "description1": "华商优势行业的每日累计收益率的时序数据",
 "arg2": ["result4", "Cumulative_Earnings_Rate"],
 "function2": "calculate_stock_index",
 "output2": "result6",
 "description2": "易方达蓝筹精选的每日累计收益率的时序数据"
}
